title: Zacs E no longer shows max range
body: So i was playing {{champion:154}}  yesterday for the first time this patch, and i noticed his E indicator had been changed in a way that it no longer shows max range. Is there any context on this change because i feel like it makes him a bit harder to play as i don't play him enough to know his E ranges per level.

replies.body: Yeah iv already complained about this like a week ago, nothing has been done yet. At least it gives me time to learn elise now
Riot knows of this visual bug, they will be fixing it soon.
i hope so zac is my main! {{champion:154}}
and Zac is my main as well {{champion:154}}

Was posted on reddit quite a bit a few days ago
[Riot's response](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/40xr1k/changes_to_zacs_e/cyyddul)
Thanks alot, i was thinking it was a bug but i wasn't quite sure
